lenders.name: Lee snd Donna
lenders.loan_because: We take very seriously our Lord's charge to help the poor, and believe this is a marvelous way to do so.. microfinance with people helping people seems to be a brilliant way, in many ways so superior to government programs.
lenders.occupational_info: May the love of Jesus Christ encourage your heart, knowing there are people who love you, and want to help...

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.occupation: Fair trade retailer and textile conservator
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people who are active in working towards a better life for themselves and their families.  I particularly would like to support artisans working with traditional textile arts to help ensure the continuation these traditions
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked with textiles for many years and support fair trade and handmade textiles from many parts of the world through my Gallery, Fabric of Life

lenders.name: Greg & John
lenders.loan_because: John and I live very priviledged lives on this planet. As a couple about to celebrate 25 years sharing a wonderful life, it is time for us to give back in many different ways.  Kiva is one of them.
lenders.occupational_info: Greg retired from teaching 2 years ago and now operates a hypnotherapy practice.  Greg teaches people how to believe in themselves, and reach the goals they set for themselves.  John works with individuals to maximize their financial resources. As a gay couple we want to encourage all people to follow their dreams and create meaningful lives for themselves.  To your own self be true.

lenders.name: Amy + Doug

lenders.occupational_info:
I have been involved in charity all my life and the one thing that stands out on my journey ,is just how unmotivated they are when they have nothing to look forward too.This money will create a centre for learning lifeskills(to stay off drugs )and computer savvy courses to get a job and uplift themselves for employment.I live in a small suburb where unemployment is high and drugs rife.There is no acivities and the future of our kids is at stake.We need funds to change this

Thanks

lenders.name: sharon
lenders.loan_because: I believe that all God's People deserve the best in life and when we help those who help themselves it strengths the will of God!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Social Work Intern and I work for Child Welfare Services.  I work with children and families who are poor and in need.  It gives me great pleasure to know that I can make a difference in the life of a child and their families

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.occupational_info:
I have travelled throught North America as an insurance adjuster handling catastrophic losses, both property and injury.  

As a claims examiner I bring my experience to assist other adjusters in bringing their files to conclusion.  I currently work in a company that writes business in various high risk categories, from marine insurance to white water rafting to high value homes and more.  

It is a busy and hectic job, but one that is interesting and different each day.  It requires knowledge in many different areas and tact and professionalism dealing with both other professionals and those persons that have unfortunately been touched with some type of loss.

lenders.name: Will
lenders.loan_because: Trade not aid
lenders.occupational_info: People stuff

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: We believe the best hope for development is through micro finance. We want to help others make a life.
lenders.occupational_info: We operate an adventure therapy program for troubled youth and experiential education programs for all ages.

lenders.name: Marnie
lenders.loan_because: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." - Margaret Mead

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I want to make investments that have a beneficial impact on the communities that they affect.
lenders.occupational_info: I help design and optimize solar power plants.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because:
I truly want to make a difference and Kiva is the fastest way to impact many people's lives in the shortest period of time .
My family came to the United States as refugees and they were offered help by kind families and organizations.
Now that I have the means to help others, why not.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am trained to understand the spoken and unspoken needs of consumers and address it with product solutions that are well thought through to improve an overall user experience while at the same time meet a reasonable price target and return good profit margins.
My job is a glorified version of what these entrepreneurs on Kiva do on a daily basis.

lenders.name: Anil
lenders.loan_because: I have joined as a Lender in this forum, as I strongly believe that a borrower should get the finance his/her business idea deserves with respect and dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a large company with 15000+ agents supporting (mostly American) customers from BPO centers in North America, Europe, India and the Phillippines.

lenders.name: Linnéa
lenders.loan_because: It was a birthday present from a very good friend that know me well. Thank you!

lenders.occupational_info: Helping others directly or indirectly is an important part of my life.

lenders.occupational_info: Clients turn to me to help them solve problems they're having, primarily about housing issues.  I do research with consumers to discover why they are acting the ways that they do.  My clients use that information to help them correct things, like poor customer service, that are driving people away.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.whereabouts: A quaint little town in Georgia, USA
lenders.loan_because: It brings complete happiness to me, knowing that something so small can help others achieve things that are bigger than I will ever be able to understand. To see these people and to help them realize their hopes and dreams is one of my life's greatest honors.

lenders.name: Chosei
lenders.loan_because: it's a simple way to love others and honor our Lord.

lenders.name: Judd
lenders.loan_because: I'm a believer in the small business owner.

lenders.loan_because:
It makes us feel good to help others!

In doing so, we also support Caitlin's efforts to help others in the world through her "Caitlins Team" fund raising.

We help others with a loan and we show Caitlin she can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info:
It's amazing to think that $25.00 can help change someone's life.  

We love that this is a LOAN and it will be repaid to me so I may repeat the cycle and help another person.

lenders.name: PEGGY
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel so very good.  I worked long and hard most of my life.  Retirement is great, I travel a lot, but participating in this work is very special to me.

lenders.loan_because: EVERY little bit helps. I feel incredibly blessed to be where I am today, and want to give other women that same chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I study the history of France in the seventeenth century and teach European history to undergraduates.

lenders.name: Birgit
lenders.loan_because: I´m happy to help - and I believe in the projects I support.

lenders.occupational_info: Work in the infrastructure management field for a environmental organization

lenders.name: Yolanda

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a store and sell things.

lenders.name: Mason
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference in somebody's life.

lenders.name: Jacqueline

I am the president of the American Muslim Women's Association here in AZ, which does a variety of service work.  

www.i-am-americanmuslim.org is my way to help create space for our young people (and old people like me!) to forge their own unique identity as American Muslims.

lenders.loan_because: The money I have is not of my own, I am only it's temporary steward. Therefore I wish to use the money in a way my master would be proud of.

lenders.name: Mari
lenders.occupational_info: I fly airplanes.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist in the eradication of poverty.  I have come to understand that I have been blessed with food, clothing, and extra money each month and now I want to give back to those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at Andrews University as a graduate assistant to two professors.  I assist in the teaching of undergraduate classes, I help shape curriculum, and I participate in office administration.

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is nothing short of brilliant.  By providing an avenue of direct action, Kiva has been instrumental in helping me and other lenders turn our idealism for a more just world into a real practice that changes lives.  It is a privilege to be able to stand among people of such good will around the world, and to be able to support these creative, hard-working entrepreneurs.  Thank you,  Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: People come to me when they are sick or in pain, and I help them through the practice of Chinese Medicine...herbs and acupuncture.

lenders.name: Pierre
lenders.loan_because: I like to leverage my money by helping other people to improve their income/quality of life. As the very famous proverb says : "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime". Micro credit has proven to be a successful way of doing that.

lenders.name: Serge
lenders.loan_because:
"The earth is but one country and mankind its citizens."
That's my inspiration.

"La terre n'est qu'un seul pays et tous les hommes en sont les citoyens"

lenders.name: Philipp
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to lift themselves from poverty!

lenders.name: Brady
lenders.loan_because: this is something I believe in.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kimberley
lenders.loan_because: I want to learn about entreprising women around the world, and support them as I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help clinic patients give money to support my clinic's mission in health care, education and research.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because:
Since banks are not always doing their job, maybe it's time for people like me to lend some money to entrepreneur's all around the world. 

Take a look below, all of them have paid back on time. You must trust these women and men.

lenders.name: Jeff L.
lenders.loan_because: Working under the assumption that globalization is here to stay, then giving the more means for individuals to participate in capitalism will raise all boats.  Plus I like helping people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find information and books.

lenders.name: A.J.
lenders.loan_because: Providing financing to entrepreneurs in developing countries is an excellent way to give an individual a chance to be successful and at the same time increase standards of living in that country.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student studying economics and international business.

lenders.name: Beau Harrison
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with a wonderful, well paying job and I need to share my fortune with the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Fermilab is a high energy particle physics research institute. My coworkers and I are responsible for making science happen as efficiently as possible.

lenders.name: Ava
lenders.loan_because: I want to see others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Susie's 1st born daughter

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I am learning to give to others that have less than me.  This is a good way to touch other lives in the world.

lenders.name: Benicia High SAGE
lenders.loan_because: We are the Benicia HS SAGE team and we are committed to helping entrepreneurs around the world live their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: Students for the Advancement of Global Entrepreneurship (SAGE) are high school students around the world who  complete business and social ventures to improve their communities and those they touch globally. At the end of the academic year, the student teams showcase their efforts on a regional, national and world stage. Benicia High has been the California State champion twice, and in 2009, placed second in the nation and fifth at the World Competition in Brasilia, Brazil.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: Because of my Fantastic friends who first donated for me to lend.
lenders.occupational_info: i replace the the teeth that people have lost.

lenders.name: KKH
lenders.loan_because: I like investing in people.
lenders.occupational_info: I perform medical ultrasound imaging.

lenders.name: Clayton
lenders.loan_because: I used to be homeless and it was through the help of others that I'm now able to work, and soon go back to college.  I think it is good Karma to help others that want to help themselves.  My goal is to be a doctor, and I want to help others achieve their goals too.
lenders.occupational_info: I cook food for many people everyday at the Burger King. I make drinks, and accept payment for meals.  I also clean the dining area, and take out the trash.  I get to see and talk to many different people everyday.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the world can be a better place than it is today.  By lending, I hope that I can help people lift other people, along with their families and communities out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend American University where I am pursuing degrees in Political Science, Public Communication, and Economics

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: To honor my Heavenly Father.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a machine shop that makes parts for other company's products.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough that I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an auditor for a large accounting firm.  We help ensure that the financial statements issued by other companies are free from significant errors.

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: I like using technology to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to share information with each other, find things and use technology to accomplish tasks through the internet.

lenders.name: Lulu
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info:
live life with wonder’s vision & purpose is to encourage a renewed sense of wonder in life, living each day fully, abundantly, passionately and inspiringly 
to inspire mothers / women with spiritual interests through a quality, educational medium - manifesting mums 
a reminder to continually awaken to the inner connectedness to 'all that is', connecting to the unlimiting universe 
to write, print and publish universal wisdom creatively in beautiful children's books 
to build your acknowledgement muscle, reminding you that through praise we are able to heartfully 'gift' each other

lenders.name: Igor
lenders.loan_because:
It is the right thing to do. Living in a metro city, we tend to forget how privileged we are. We get sad because, we do not have the car we want, nor the apartment at waterfront, or maybe even the looks we'd like.  These things are allright, but they tend to blind us to more important things in life such as health, companionship, hunger, love. 
Alot of times we can not do much about our circumstances, but for $25 we can improve someone else 's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a system administrator for a payments company in British Columbia. My usual duties include: updating firewalls, setting up services such as voip, suirvalence, vpn, mail, and daily server maintnance. 99% of our servers are Open Source friendly!

lenders.name: Christal
lenders.loan_because: it's amazing to see people realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my bank decide if and how much we should loan US power companies.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I am able to help
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom to 3 children, two dogs and a husband. We live a quiet life in Colorado, US. I am also a photographer and fiber artist.

lenders.name: Takeshi T.
lenders.occupational_info: Development Assistance

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the people who can't buy what they need in order to make a living.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 12 year old 6th grade student who tries hard in school.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because:
I don't have much, but I have more than some and believe God wants us to leave this world a better place than before we came into it.

God Bless America.

lenders.name: Graham
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in Social Entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a start-up company called Donations2Dollars.  We assist non-profits fundraising programs by providing a new and easy way to make donations to your favorite non-profit.  Visit www.donations2dollars.com for more information.

lenders.name: Claire and Ian
lenders.loan_because: It's great to help others!

lenders.name: Ryder
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a very busy coffee shop.  I take orders and pour espresso shots to create a variety of drinks.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I help manifest dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people to take responsibility for their lives through movement awareness.

lenders.name: Lily and Keenan
lenders.loan_because: we believe in the power of microfinance as a sustainable approach to poverty alleviation.  As global citizens, we want to make a difference in this world, and encourage you to take part in this movement.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an assistant to a sculptor. I manage the business so she is free to create the art.

lenders.name: Margery
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wife and a mother of four. My husband is a school teacher.

lenders.name: Garage Sale Blog Network
lenders.occupational_info: An eclectic mix of Garage Sale items coming at you in humanistic form. This is the Garage Sale Blog - 13 people, 13 strands of life, 13 very different ways of looking at the world.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy lending because it is a very practical way to help other people.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: Why wouldn't you? This is the gift that keeps giving back to the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I wake up, go to class, read a lot, go to bed and repeat five days a week...

lenders.name: Tine
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: ...I want to contribute to heal the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Kiva is one of the million possible ways to heal the world. ;-) Furthermore it's one of the easiest; but nevertheless a very efficient one!

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: particularly in this market, there is no better return on an investment than making people's lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a large financial firm in New York City, and I love it!

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: I would like to impart a change in the life of someone even for a day by lending money that would go a long way to helping them step out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and export cocao and coffee abroad.I also work as a leader of a small charity group in Cameroon called City of Light Foundation. That sponsors orphans in schools.

lenders.name: chris
lenders.loan_because: Because I want to in prove and to contribute in the area of civilization and education to the globe
lenders.occupational_info: An outstanding and interested as well as development

lenders.name: don
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Camilo
lenders.whereabouts: Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I want to do what I think Jesus would do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a non-profit organization that provides treatment for children who suffer from physical and developmental problems.

lenders.name: The Davis Family
lenders.loan_because: This is a family activity to show our children the value of hard work and to be a good global citizen.

lenders.name: Panutat
lenders.loan_because: I believe a little bit of help can go a long way. It takes very little effort to change an entire life and community.
lenders.occupational_info: I own several businesses including a software company and night club.

lenders.name: Marypat
lenders.loan_because:
I am blessed enough to be able to offer these monies to others.
My son in law is native to Sierra Leone so I feel a connection there.
We are all the same people wherever we live in this world. i love to give, I love to receive and I love to get to know people and their different lives. Thank you
lenders.occupational_info: I live in Homer, Alaska with my partner Jules who is the love of my life,and our 3 dogs. I love to swim, fish, walk my dogs, look for Moose, watch the birds, create and wear dresses that  twirl. I work as an appraiser,  inspecting real property (land and/or structures) to estimate an accurate value and verify the condition of the property and its improvements.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I fix that which make others productive.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I need it to maintain my spiritual health.

lenders.name: Marsha
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an emergency room.

lenders.name: Johnathan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs an opportunity to prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers - hardware, software, and networking.  I'm also studying to be an Electrical Engineer.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: it's a small way to make a big difference - and it's fun!

lenders.name: Arjun
lenders.loan_because: It seems like such a simple way to help people throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer and an editor. My next book is out spring 2014 with ECW Press.

lenders.name: Max Volpi
lenders.loan_because: I like concrete acts.
lenders.occupational_info: ...in progress...

lenders.name: Kati
lenders.loan_because: the loans give individuals a chance to take advantage of business opportunities; and lending teaches me good business sense, too
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Prisma Microfinance, and MFI like yours!

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I really like the way Kiva is set up. Not only do you know where your money is going, you get to see and read about the impact that your money (and other people's money) has on the people from around the world. It is a fantastic idea and I am very glad to be a part of this, even in a tiny way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student working towards becoming a registered nurse (one day possibly a nurse practitioner).

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: i believe small things can make big differences - all people need is a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies buy other companies or sell themselves

lenders.name: Ritva
lenders.loan_because: I like to share dreams of people.

lenders.name: Jana
lenders.loan_because: I help because I am able to at this time.  We all come from the same puddle of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been an activist for years for human rights issues.  I am of Oklahoma Choctaw Indian  blood.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: It's good karma!
